content.p: Print RCWs > Title 74 > Chapter 74.39A > Section 74.39A.100 74.39A.095 << 74.39A.100 >> 74.39A.110 PDF RCW 74.39A.100 Chore services — Legislative finding, intent. The legislature finds that it is desirable to provide a coordinated and comprehensive program of in-home services for certain citizens in order that such persons may remain in their own homes, obtain employment if possible, and maintain a closer contact with the community. Such a program will seek to prevent mental and psychological deterioration which our citizens might otherwise experience. The legislature intends that the services will be provided in a fashion which promotes independent living. [ 1980 c 137 s 1 ; 1973 1st ex.s. c 51 s 1 . Formerly RCW 74.08.530 .]
